<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H3961|לִשָּׁן]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָשׁוֺן‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Josh.7.21|Josh 7:21]]</sup> and (more often) **feminine**<sup>[[Isa.28.11|Isa 28:11]]</sup> ==tongue== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; also Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***lišânu***</u></abbr>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לִשָּׁן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִישָּׁן‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (all ***li-***); Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לשן‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Sendsch. 59</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Exod.4.10|Exod 4:10]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלָּשֹׁן‎</span> [[Josh.15.2|Josh 15:2]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשׁוֺן‎</span> [[Josh.7.21|Josh 7:21]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשׁוֺנִי‎</span> [[2Sam.23.2|2Sam 23:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשֹׁנוֺ‎</span> [[Exod.11.7|Exod 11:7]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשׁוֺנוֺ‎</span> [[Judg.7.5|Judg 7:5]]; [[Esth.1.22|Esth 1:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשׁוֺנְךָ‎</span> [[Ps.34.14|Ps 34:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשׁוֺנְכֶם‎</span> [[Isa.59.3|Isa 59:3]], etc.; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשֹׁנוֺת‎</span> absolute [[Ps.31.21|Ps 31:21]]; [[Isa.66.18|Isa 66:18]] construct [[Zech.8.23|Zech 8:23]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשֹׁנֹתָם‎</span> [[Gen.10.20|Gen 10:20]]; [[Gen.10.31|Gen 10:31]] — 

**1.** ***tongue*** of men, 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** used in lapping [[Judg.7.5|Judg 7:5]] cleaving to the palate (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵק‎</span>), in thirst [[Lam.4.4|Lam 4:4]], so as to produce dumbness [[Job.29.10|Job 29:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺל נֶחְבָּא‎</span>), [[Ps.137.6|Ps 137:6]]; [[Ezek.3.26|Ezek 3:26]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶאֱלַם‎</span>); cleaving to jaws (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְקוֺחַ‎</span>) [[Ps.22.16|Ps 22:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּצָּמָא נָשָׁ֑תָּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Isa.41.17|Isa 41:17]] ***their tongue for thirst is parched***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּמַּק בְּפִיהֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Zech.14.12|Zech 14:12]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s judgment); a choice morsel is held <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת ל‎</span> [[Job.20.12|Job 20:12]] (figurative of mischief), compare [[Ps.10.7|Ps 10:7]] (ready to be uttered), [[Ps.66.17|Ps 66:17]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּה‎</span>), [[Song.4.11|Song 4:11]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** usually as organ of speech, both good and bad (especially Psalms, Proverbs, often \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂפָה‎</span>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּבַד ל‎</span> [[Exod.4.10|Exod 4:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) ***heavy of tongue***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲנֵה ל‎</span> [[Prov.16.1|Prov 16:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלָּתוֺ עַללְֿשׁוֺנִי‎</span> [[2Sam.23.2|2Sam 23:2]], compare [[Prov.31.26|Prov 31:26]]; [[Ps.139.4|Ps 139:4]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּל‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲיֵשׁ בִּלְשׁוֺנִי עַוְלָה‎</span> [[Job.6.30|Job 6:30]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָוֶת וְחַיִּים בְּיַד ל‎</span> [[Prov.18.21|Prov 18:21]], compare [[Prov.21.23|Prov 21:23]]; [[Prov.25.15|Prov 25:15]] of (false) prophets, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלֹּקְהִים ל‎</span> [[Jer.23.31|Jer 23:31]] subject of verb of speaking, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֶּר‎</span> [[BDB#Di|Di]] — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִחִכִּי דִּבְּרָה לְשׁוֺנִי‎</span> [[Job.33.2|Job 33:2]]; [[Ps.12.4|Ps 12:4]]; [[Ps.37.30|Ps 37:30]] compare ([[Jer.9.7|Jer 9:7]] below and) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎֗֗֗ תְּמַהֵר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְדַבֵּר‎</span> [[Isa.32.4|Isa 32:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשׁוֺנִי עֵט סֹפֵר מָהִיר‎</span> [[Ps.45.2|Ps 45:2]], i.e. as swift as a rapid scribe's stylus; subject of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָגָה‎</span> [[Isa.59.3|Isa 59:3]]; [[Job.27.4|Job 27:4]]; [[Ps.35.28|Ps 35:28]]; [[Ps.71.24|Ps 71:24]] subject of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁבַּע‎</span> [[Isa.45.23|Isa 45:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּהַלַךְ בָּאָרֶץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Ps.73.9|Ps 73:9]] of hostile speech, insolence, etc., [[Josh.10.21|Josh 10:21]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; object of I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָרַץ‎</span> q. v., compare **3** below), [[Jer.18.18|Jer 18:18]]; [[Isa.3.8|Isa 3:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זַעַם ל‎</span> [[Hos.7.16|Hos 7:16]] (but text dubious, compare [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶב חַדָּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Ps.57.6|Ps 57:6]], compare [[Ps.64.4|Ps 64:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּמוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָחָשׁ שָֽׁנְנוּ ל‎</span> [[Ps.140.4|Ps 140:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּקוּם אִתָּךְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּללֿ‎</span> [[Isa.54.17|Isa 54:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶאֱרִיךְ ל‎</span> [[Isa.57.4|Isa 57:4]] further, [[Jer.9.2|Jer 9:2]]; [[Jer.9.4|Jer 9:4]] as instrument of seductive flattery (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶחֱלִיק‎</span>), without <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>, [[Ps.5.10|Ps 5:10]]; [[Prov.28.33|Prov 28:33]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָכְרִיָּה חֶלְקַת לָ‎</span> [[Prov.6.24|Prov 6:24]]. of falsehood [[Ps.78.36|Ps 78:36]] (compare below); of slander (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לושֵׁן‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַל עַללֿ‎</span> [[Ps.15.3|Ps 15:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ לָשׁוֺן‎</span>[[Ps.140.12|Ps 140:12]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָ֑תֶר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Prov.25.33|Prov 25:33]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָטָא בְּל‎</span> [[Ps.39.2|Ps 39:2]] compare [[Ps.64.9|Ps 64:9]] (text dubious, see [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]); moral qualities ascribed to: — as arrogant [[Ps.12.5|Ps 12:5]] (compare v[[Ps.12.4|Ps 12:4]] above); as devising injuries, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַוּוֺת תַּחְשֹׁב ל‎</span> [[Ps.52.4|Ps 52:4]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Prov.17.4|Prov 17:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּצְמִיד מִרְמָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Ps.50.19|Ps 50:19]] ***nectere fraudem***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵרָ֑ע נְצֹר ל‎</span> [[Ps.34.14|Ps 34:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ׅ‎</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(וּשְׂפָתֶיךָ מִדַּבֵּר מִרְמָה‎</span>; often of lying tongue: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשׁוֺן שֶׁקֶר‎</span> [[Prov.6.17|Prov 6:17]]; [[Prov.12.19|Prov 12:19]]; [[Prov.21.6|Prov 21:6]]; [[Prov.26.28|Prov 26:28]]; [[Ps.109.2|Ps 109:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִרְמָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Ps.52.6|Ps 52:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְמִיָּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָ‎</span> [[Mic.6.12|Mic 6:12]]; [[Ps.120.2|Ps 120:2]]; [[Ps.120.3|Ps 120:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּרְמִית‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Zeph.3.13|Zeph 3:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּהְפֻּכוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Prov.10.31|Prov 10:31]], and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶהְפָּךְ בִּל‎</span> [[Prov.17.20|Prov 17:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרוּמִים‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Job.15.5|Job 15:5]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִרְמָה דִּבֵּ֑ר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Jer.9.7|Jer 9:7]] on the other hand <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַדִּיק‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Prov.10.20|Prov 10:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲכָמִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Prov.12.18|Prov 12:18]]; [[Prov.15.2|Prov 15:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְפֵּה לָ‎</span> v[[Prov.15.4|Prov 15:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִמּוּדִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Isa.50.4|Isa 50:4]]. — Note phrases <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺט ל‎</span> [[Job.5.21|Job 5:21]] ***scourge of*** (the) ***tongue***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיב לְשֹׁנוֺת‎</span> [[Ps.31.21|Ps 31:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּלַּג לְשׁוֺנָם‎</span> [[Ps.55.10|Ps 55:10]]: also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעַל הַלּ‎</span> [[Eccl.10.11|Eccl 10:11]] (of serpent-charmer), and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתֵּעֲלוּ עַלשְֿׂפַת ל‎</span> [[Ezek.36.3|Ezek 36:3]]. — On tongue of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> (once), see **4** below 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** organ of singing, subject of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָנַן‎</span> [[Ps.51.16|Ps 51:16]]; [[Ps.126.2|Ps 126:2]]; [[Isa.35.6|Isa 35:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָה‎</span> [[Ps.119.172|Ps 119:172]]. 

**2.** = ***language*** [[Deut.28.49|Deut 28:49]]; [[Jer.5.15|Jer 5:15]] and later, namely: [[Ezek.3.5|Ezek 3:5]]; [[Ezek.3.6|Ezek 3:6]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּבְדֵי ל‎</span>, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִמְקֵי שָׂפָה‎</span>, but strike out [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] Manuscripts [[BDB#Co|Co]] Sgfr<sup>KauAT</sup>), [[Isa.28.11|Isa 28:11]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֶרֶת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעֲגֵי שָׂפָה‎</span>, figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s unintelligible dealings); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַם ֗֗֗ נִלְעַג ל‎</span> [[Isa.33.19|Isa 33:19]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִמְקֵי שָׂפָה‎</span>); [[Isa.66.18|Isa 66:18]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גּוֺיִם‎</span>), [[Zech.8.23|Zech 8:23]]; [[Gen.10.5|Gen 10:5]]; [[Gen.10.20|Gen 10:20]]; [[Gen.10.31|Gen 10:31]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Neh.13.24|Neh 13:24]]; [[Esth.1.22|Esth 1:22]] (twice in verse); [[Esth.3.12|Esth 3:12]]; [[Esth.8.9|Esth 8:9]] (twice in verse); [[Dan.1.4|Dan 1:4]]. 

**3.** ***tongue*** of animals: dog [[Exod.11.7|Exod 11:7]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; object of I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָרַץ‎</span> q. v.; compare **1 b**), [[Ps.68.24|Ps 68:24]] adder [[Job.20.16|Job 20:16]] (subjectof <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּהֲרֹג‎</span>); crocodile [[Job.40.25|Job 40:25]]. 

**4.** ***tongue*** of fire, devouring, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּאֱכֹל קַשׁ לְשׁוֺן אֵשׁ‎</span> [[Isa.5.24|Isa 5:24]] compare of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּלְשׁוֺנוֺ כְּאֵשׁ אֹכָ֑לֶת‎</span> [[Isa.30.27|Isa 30:27]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂפָתָיו מָֽלְאוּ זַעַם‎</span>). 

**5.** = (***tongue-***shaped) ***wedge*** of gold [[Josh.7.21|Josh 7:21]]; [[Josh.7.24|Josh 7:24]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]). **\*\***So Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***lišânu***</u></abbr>; see Meissn<sup>ZAW xxlii {1905}, 151 f.</sup> Johns<sup>Assyrian Deeds 2, 281</sup>. 

**6.** = (***tongue-***shaped) ***bay*** of sea [[Isa.11.15|Isa 11:15]]; [[Josh.15.2|Josh 15:2]]; [[Josh.15.5|Josh 15:5]]; [[Josh.18.19|Josh 18:19]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]).
